name: Bulwark of the Mountain
tooltip:
Bulwark of the Mountain

Cost: 400
+20 Ability Power
+250 Health
+100% Health per 5

UNIQUE Passive - Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

UNIQUE Active - Ward: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.
